query:
SELECT 
                id,
                canonical_name,
                external_ids,
                metadata
            FROM artists 
            WHERE 
                canonical_name ILIKE $1 
                OR canonical_name ILIKE $2
                OR aliases::text ILIKE $1
            ORDER BY 
                CASE 
                    WHEN canonical_name ILIKE $2 THEN 1
                    WHEN canonical_name ILIKE $1 THEN 2
                    ELSE 3
                END,
                canonical_name
            LIMIT $3
